objects.text:
• Limited Edition Wolf Grey with gold swoosh
• Flyknit technology for lightweight comfort
• Classic high-top silhouette with modern design

product_details.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Flyknit - Wolf Grey/Gold Edition | Premium Comfort Meets Classic Style
product_details.description:
• ✨ Limited Edition Wolf Grey colorway with striking gold Nike swoosh
• 🧶 Revolutionary Flyknit upper technology for lightweight breathability
• 👟 Classic Air Jordan 1 high-top silhouette with modern upgrades
• 🔄 Flexible knit construction that adapts to your foot shape
• 💪 Durable gum rubber outsole for superior traction and grip
• 🌟 Premium cushioning for all-day comfort
• 🔥 Iconic wing logo detailing maintains heritage design
• ♻️ Sustainable materials with reduced environmental impact
• 🏃‍♂️ Perfect for both athletic performance and street style
• 👔 Versatile colorway pairs well with any outfit

banner_details:
This banner features a bold, modern design split vertically into two halves: the left side has a dark navy blue gradient background and the right side a soft off-white. The left segment contains five primary text layers. The prominent heading ("heading") uses tall, condensed typography in white, followed by a striking subheading ("subheading") in a bold gold tone. The features list ("description") is formatted in white and introduces the product with bullet points beneath the subheading. Just below, a large gold price ("price") stands out above a rectangular gold call-to-action button ("cta_button") housing a contrasty white label ("cta"). The right side showcases the product image ("product_image") featuring a floating pair of grey and gold sneakers. Decorative abstract shapes in gold add modern flair throughout both halves of the banner.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Gradient: #2A3B4C to #1A2530  
- Gold: #D4AF37  
- Off-White: #F2F2F2  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a stylish pair of high-top sneakers with a modern and clean aesthetic. The primary color is a soft light gray (#D0D4D8), covering most of the shoe's knit upper and laces. This neutral tone provides a calm base that blends seamlessly into the white midsole (#F1F1F1). Accents are highlighted in warm mustard yellow (#DAA520), including the Nike swoosh, branding, and outsole edges. This yellow provides a vibrant contrast that draws attention without overpowering. The color palette for an advertisement banner should include: Light Gray (#D0D4D8), Mustard Yellow (#DAA520), White (#F1F1F1), and a soft Charcoal (#4A4A4A) for subtle depth.
